title: Juu Ou Sei (Jyu-Oh-Sei: Planet of the Beast King)
synopsis: After the murder of their parents, 11-year-old twin brothers Thor and Rai Klein are sent away from their home planet. They find themselves awakening on the terraformed planet of Chimaera, where carnivorous plants dominate and the few humans who live there are divided into four groups known as "Rings." Soon after, they meet a young man by the name of Zagi, and the twins learn that only the "Jyu Oh Sei"—the one who conquers these four Rings—is allowed to leave the planet.
voices: ['Oguri, Shun', 'Takayama, Minami', 'Nakai, Kazuya', 'Mizuki, Nana', 'Park, Romi', 'Takayama, Minami', 'Fukami, Rica', 'Takase, Akimitsu', 'Shimura, Tomoyuki']
